meta.description: Optimize the number of old and new vans used to minimize pollution while meeting soda delivery requirements.

sets.name: VAN_TYPES
sets.description: Types of vans available for transporting soda bottles.

params.name: capacity
params.description: Capacity of each van type in terms of soda bottles.

params.name: pollution
params.description: Pollution produced by each van type.

vars.name: vans
vars.description: Number of vans of each type to be used.

objective.name: min_total_pollution
objective.description: Minimize the total pollution produced by the vans.

constraints.name: bottle_requirement
constraints.description: Ensure at least 5000 bottles are delivered.

constraints.name: new_van_limit
constraints.description: Limit the number of new vans to at most 30.
